Control Statement: The information system automatically updates malicious code protection mechanisms.Supplemental Guidance:  Malicious code protection mechanisms include, for example, signature definitions. Due to information system integrity and availability concerns, organizations give careful consideration to the methodology used to carry out automatic updates. Related control: SI-8.
